fields.name: AutoDownloadCertificate
fields.description: Determines if the certificate should be automatically downloaded. This applies to 'caCertificateURI' only if 'requireValidCertificate' is true.

fields.name: CaCertificateURI
fields.description: The URI of the CA certificate to validate the LDAP secure connection. This field must be populated when 'requireValidCertificate' is set to true.

fields.name: Credentials
fields.description: When present, these are the credentials for the secure LDAP connection.

fields.name: EncryptLdapConnection
fields.description: Whether or not the LDAP connection should be encrypted.

fields.name: ExtendedGroups
fields.description: Whether or not Extended Groups is enabled.

fields.name: GroupFileURI
fields.description: The URI of the file containing group information (in /etc/group file format). This field must be populated when 'usernameSource' is set to 'File'.

fields.name: LdapBaseDN
fields.description: The base distinguished name for the LDAP domain.

fields.name: LdapServer
fields.description: The fully qualified domain name or IP address of the LDAP server to use.

fields.name: RequireValidCertificate
fields.description: Determines if the certificates must be validated by a certificate authority. When true, caCertificateURI must be provided.

fields.name: UserFileURI
fields.description: The URI of the file containing user information (in /etc/passwd file format). This field must be populated when 'usernameSource' is set to 'File'.

fields.name: UsernameDownloaded
fields.description: Indicates whether or not the HPC Cache has performed the username download successfully.

fields.name: UsernameSource
fields.description: This setting determines how the cache gets username and group names for clients.
